Disability advocates back $750 fine for those abusing mobility car parks https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/30/disability-advocates-back-750-fine-for-those-abusing-mobility-car-parks/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/30/disability-advocates-back-750-fine-for-those-abusing-mobility-car-parks/ Wynsley WrigleyDrivers face a 500% fine increase for parking in disability spots, now $750 from Tuesday. Mon, 30 Sep 2024 01:40:48 +0000 Barbara Barwick displays her mobility card while parked in one of the disability car parks outside Gisborne District Council. Motorists who abuse the blue-coloured disability car parks are liable to be issued an increased fine of $750, effective from Tuesday. Photo / Wynsley Wrigley
